description.hltext_display: Los aeropuertos europeos comienzan la vuelta a la normalidad
description.author: lainformacion.com | agencias
description.content:
Unos 60 vuelos se han cancelado hoy en el aeropuerto de Fráncfort , en su mayoría como consecuencia de las alteraciones persistentes en otros puntos de Europa. Unos 600 pasajeros han pernoctado en las literas instaladas en las terminales del aeropuerto, el de mayor tráfico en la Europa continental.
Pese a ello, Fraport, la empresa gestora del aeropuerto, considera que el tráfico aéreo tenderá a normalizarse y la situación se descongestionará si se cumplen unas previsiones meteorológicas más benignas al menos hasta mañana.
Tras las fuertes nevadas caídas en los seis días pasados, en que debieron anularse sólo en Fráncfort unos 2.300 vuelos, se espera para hoy un ascenso de temperaturas y precipitaciones en forma de lluvia o agua-nieve. El resto de los aeródromos alemanes funcionan con normalidad.
En Heathrow no volará un tercio de los aviones
El aeropuerto londinense de Heathrow espera operar dos tercios de sus vuelos, después de que ayer reabriera su segunda pista una vez que los servicios de limpieza retiraron por completo la nieve que la cubría desde el pasado sábado.
Pese a todo, Heathrow -el aeropuerto europeo con mayor tráfico aéreo- ha pedido a los pasajeros que se pongan en contacto con sus respectivas aerolíneas para asegurarse que sus vuelos operarán hoy antes de viajar hasta la terminal aérea. "Ahora estamos trabajando con las aerolíneas para volver al programa normal lo antes posible", señala un comunicado de Heathrow.
El pasado sábado, Heathrow se vio obligado a cerrar por completo y funcionó bajo mínimos durante los tres días posteriores.
Otros aeropuertos británicos han advertido de que habrá problemas en sus servicios, especialmente en los de Edimburgo (Escocia), Birmingham (centro de Inglaterra) y Gatwick (sur de Londres).
Bruselas ya tiene anticongelante
El aeropuerto de Bruselas-Zaventem ha podido volver a operar con normalidad esta mañana tras reponer sus reservas de líquido anticongelante . Sin embargo, persisten algunos retrasos y anulaciones en vuelos hacia al centro y norte de Europa por las condiciones meteorológicas en estos destinos.
El aeropuerto de la capital belga anunció ayer que volvía "a las operaciones normales de invierno" , después de que la escasez de anticongelante, utilizado para evitar que los alerones y la cola de los aviones queden bloqueados por la presencia de hielo, obligara a cancelar la mayoría de las salidas desde el lunes por la tarde.
No obstante, la compañía gestora de Zaventem recomienda a los viajeros que comprueben los detalles de su vuelo en la página web , ya que se están produciendo retrasos y cancelaciones de vuelos hacia ciudades como Amsterdam, Zúrich, Fráncfort, Dublin, Viena o Copenhague, por sus condiciones meteorológicas.
La misma situación se da en el aeropuerto de Amsterdam-Schipol , que avisa en su web de las posibles alteraciones del tráfico aéreo a causa de la nieve, aunque la mayoría de los vuelos operan con normalidad.
París, pendiente del tiempo
Los servicios meteorológicos franceses anunciaban hoy un nuevo temporal de nieve que desde esta tarde barrerá el norte del país de oeste a este, con riesgo de nuevos problemas en los aeropuertos, las carreteras y los trenes que apenas están volviendo a la normalidad tras el último episodio del lunes.
La situación en los aeropuertos de París se fueron normalizando ayer, cuando pudieron salir la mayor parte de los viajeros bloqueados, algunos desde el fin de semana. La excepción fueron varios cientos que esperaban aviones de otros países, sobre todo el Reino Unido y Alemania, donde la situación era mucho peor en ese momento.
12 cancelaciones en Barcelona
El Aeropuerto de El Prat ha cancelado 12 vuelos --seis llegadas y seis salidas-- hasta las 8 horas de este miércoles a causa del temporal de viento y nieve en el centro y norte de Europa. Todos los vuelos cancelados tienen como destino u origen Reino Unido (9), Francia (2) e Irlanda (1) , según ha informado Aena en un comunicado.
En los aeropuertos de Girona y Reus no ha habido ninguna afectación por el temporal que sacude Europa.

description.hltext_display: 銘柄パトロール（３）：富士重工、トヨタ、ニコン、ＬＴＴバイオファーマなど
description.content:
Y!V 【経済ニュース】 【この記事に対するコメント】 2010/12/22(水) 16:03
反落。クレディ・スイス証券は、同社の目標株価760円、「ＯＵＴＰＥＲＦＯＲＭ」の投資評価を継続した。旗艦車種「レガシィ」のモデルサイクルピークを理由に同社に対して慎重な投資家は多いが、モデルサイクルの長期化、「フォレスタ」の拡販成功、トヨタ自動車との協業メリットで2013年3月期にかけて過去最高益、最高ＲＯＥを記録するとの見方に変更はなく、強気を継続するという。
トヨタ <7203> 3240 −10
反落。クレディ・スイス証券は、同社の目標株価3370円、「ＮＥＵＴＲＡＬ」の投資判断を継続した。同社は12月21日午後1時に、2件のリコールの適時性について米国運輸省道路交通安全局（ＮＨＴＳＡ）と和解に至ったと発表。今回の件はポジティブだが、全体への影響は軽微なため投資判断の変更は不要と判断するという。日米設備稼働率の上昇、製品品質関連費用の一巡が利益率低迷を脱する鍵とみて、再評価のタイミングを見計らうスタンスは不変だそうだ。
ニコン <7731> 1665 −5
反落。野村證券は、同社の目標株価は従来の2250円を1930円に引き下げたが、レーティング「1」は継続した。野村のＡｒＦ液浸露光装置Ｓ620への期待度は顧客の投資計画の修正などから低下しているという。一方でスマートフォン、タブレットＰＣ市場拡大の恩恵を受け、ＦＰＤ露光装置の引合いは旺盛であるそうだ。戦略製品「新世代カメラ」にも期待できるとも。精機事業を中心に業績予想を下方修正したが、強気の投資判断は継続するという。
ＬＴＴバイオファーマ <4566> 16550 −560
3日続落。21日、21日より特発性肺線維症を対象疾患としたＰＣ−ＳＯＤ吸入製剤（ミジスマーゼ治験薬コード：ＰＣ−ＳＯＤ ＮＥ）の臨床第Ｉ相試験に係る「健康人を対象とした反復投与試験」を開始したと発表した。ＰＣ−ＳＯＤは、同社グループが世界で初めて開発に成功したＳＯＤのＤＤＳ製剤。今後とも同社は、さらに開発を推進し「難病の患者様に新しい治療法を提供する」という創業者水島裕氏の想いを実現すべく、ＰＣ−ＳＯＤの医薬品申請を目指して研究開発に邁進する。
くらコーポ <2695> 1282 −10
続落。いちよし経済研究所は、同社のレーティングは「Ａ」に据え置いたが、フェアバリューを従来の2500円から1800円に引き下げた。いちよしでは、店舗投資の増加に伴う減価償却費の増加及び、広告宣伝費等の増加を考慮して、11．10期以降の業績見通しを前回予想に対して下方修正したという。なお、11．10期は資産除去債務過年度損失を3億円強見込んでおり、税引利益の水準が低くなる見通しであるとも。（編集担当：佐藤弘）

・銘柄パトロール（1）：三井物、三菱地所、スカイマーク、任天堂、カカクコムなど（2010/12/22）
・銘柄パトロール：村田製作所、三菱地所、住友金属鉱山、キヤノンなど（2010/12/22）
・12月7日レーティング情報：モルガンスタンレー証券（2010/12/14）

description.hltext_display: 本阿尔法康复超预期 纽卡断腿天才二月或可复出
description.content: 本阿尔法经纪人透露，遭遇断腿厄运的法国球星复出时间将比预料的时间要提前。 本阿尔法本赛季从法甲豪门马赛以租借的形式� 盟纽卡斯尔，但是这位23岁的球星却在10月份纽卡斯尔对阵曼城的比赛中被德容铲断了脚。早前的报告称本阿尔法将会缺席本赛季的余下所有比赛，但是，现在他的经纪人Simon Stainrod向《The Journal》透露本阿尔法将会提前更早时间复出。 本阿尔法一直都做得非常、非常好。Stainrod说道。 他真的非常努力的工作，他现在正在一个训练中心，在那里从星期一到星期五他都会进行紧� 的恢复性训练，这肯定帮助他取得了如此大的进步。 尽管对于本阿尔法的复出官方并没有给出确切的日期，但是Stainrod认为这位法国射手最快二月份就可以回归。 我想，这将比开始的预测时间要提前非常、非常多。他补充道。 现在� 还不能100%确定，但是希望他可以在二月份的第一个星期复出，如果这� �那就真的太棒了。 有可能押后，也有可能提前，但是这比任何人预测的都要好。 马赛俱乐部医生上周来纽卡斯尔看过他，他真的对本阿尔法取得的进步感到高兴。（Goal.com）相关新闻： Goal.com 英超半程最差阵容：副班长三人入围 球员经纪人透露法国球星恢复情况良好……

description.hltext_display: Présentation de logiciels d’islamologie à l’exposition internationale du livre de Karachi
description.content:
Karachi(IQNA)- Des logiciels d’islamologie seront présentés par les services culturels de la République Islamique d’Iran à la 6e exposition internationale du livre de Karachi qui s’ouvre vendredi 24 décembre à Karachi.
Selon l’Agence Internationale de Presse Coranique(IQNA), citant l’organisation iranienne de la culture et des communications islamiques, la 6e exposition internationale du livre de Karachi s’ouvre vendredi au siège permanent des expositions internationales de Karachi, avec la participation d’éditeurs pakistanais et étrangers.
A cette exposition vont prendre part des éditeurs pakistanais, et des éditeurs de différents pays y compris ceux de la République Islamique d’Iran auront une présence active dans cette exposition.
Des maisons d’éditions iraniennes dont les éditions Al Hoda, dépendant de l’organisation iranienne de la culture et des communications islamiques, l’institut pour la publication des œuvres de l’Imam Khomeiny (s), les éditions Orouj, les éditions de l’Association Mondiale de l’Ahl-ol-Bayt (AS), le centre irano pakistanais pour les recherches de la langue et de la littérature persanes et les éditions internationales Ansarian participeront à cette exposition.
Les éditeurs iraniens présenteront différents logiciels dans les domaines de l’islamologie, de l’iranologie, de la langue et de la littérature persanes, des sciences théologiques, historiques et littéraires en persan, en ourdou, en anglais et en arabe. 715864

description.hltext_display: MUPromo Freebie-Apps, ein iPad ist nicht genug & Updates: Notizen vom 22.12
description.content:
MUPromo Freebie-Apps
MacUpdate hat beim aktuellen Mupromo Winter-Bundle noch eins draufgesetzt: Es gibt jetzt zwei Freebie-Apps. Neu ist, dass es für jede Newsletter-Anmeldung eine kostenlose Lizenz für das Programm Image Tricks Pro gibt. Außerdem steht noch immer das Angebot, Process gratis zu bekommen, wenn man über das Bundle twittert. Für beide Freebies ist kein Kauf des Bundles nötig. Weitere Infos dazu findet ihr auf der Mupromo-Angebotsseite.
Ein iPad ist nicht genug
Einer Studie der Research-Gruppe YouGov zu Folge haben 17% aller britischen iPad-Nutzer auch noch einen weiteren Tablet-PC. Die Gründe dafür sind sehr unterschiedlich, oft liegt es einfach an der Verfügbarkeit der Geräte, sodass zum Beispiel erst ein iPad Wifi und dann noch ein 3G dazu angeschafft wurde. Rund 19% planen außerdem, ein weiteres Tablet zu kaufen. [via Pocket Lint]
iPhone 4-Teardown-Rückcover
Nein, dieses iPhone ist nicht kaputt: Es ist lediglich "verschönert". Mit einem Aufkleber versehen täuscht das iPhone 4 vor, kein Rückcover zu haben. Ein Teardown-Fake für Nerds. Bei Etsy waren heute morgen noch 10 Stück vorhanden, Preis rund $10 plus $5 Versand.
Facetime mit dem Weihnachtsmann
AT&Ts Weihnachtsgruß zeigt, wie man kleine Kinder mit einer Verkleidung und dem iPhone 4 verzaubern kann:
Software-Updates
Fehlerbehebungen für das Foto-Tool , für das Screenshotprogramm LittleSnapper 1.7, für AppDefender 1.1.1 und für die Finder-Erweiterung TotalFinder 1.1.3. Es gibt eine neue Beta für den Webbrowser Firefox 4.0b8, die Release Notes kann man im Wiki einsehen.

description.hltext_display: German auto rebound shortens Christmas break
description.author: MELISSA EDDY
description.content:
BERLIN -- German autoworkers are this year swapping some of their Christmas break with family for time at the factory assembling someone else's gifts - and they don't have a problem with it.
Germany's leading carmakers are making the rare move of cutting holidays short as 2010 draws to a close to meet a surge in demand that is contributing to the nation's strong economic rebound from the recession.
During the worst of the global financial crisis, German automakers took advantage of the nation's traditionally generous end-of-year holidays to idle their factories, keep employees at home and cut costs. But this year most are cutting short those holiday closures, while luxury automakers BMW AG and Daimler AG are even keeping some factories running between Christmas and New Year's.
The VDA automakers' association expects car production for the year to come in at 5.5 million vehicles, 11 percent more than last year and on par with 2008 output. Fueling that growth is a strong demand from Asia, especially China.
"Emerging markets are driving the German industry, especially the automakers," said Ferdinand Dudenhoeffer, an auto expert at the University of Dusiburg-Essen.
"The high growth rate in Asia will contribute to high growth in the global economy that will set the stage for high growth in the global automobile market," Dudenhoeffer wrote in an analyst note.
The auto industry is the backbone of Germany's export-oriented economy and has contributed strongly to the 3.6 percent growth predicted by the nation's central bank this year.
German automakers are also benefiting from the recovering U.S. market, which has begun to emerge from the global financial downturn.
The big three carmakers there - General Motors Co., Ford Motor Co. and Chrysler Group - will keep plants shut over the Christmas holiday, as usual. The only exception will be Chrysler's Jefferson North plant in Detroit, which will be working one shift due to increased demand for the new Jeep Grand Cherokee and the launch of the Dodge Durango.
German companies like Munich-based BMW AG are enjoying a broader rise in demand. It recorded a 19.7 percent jump in sales for November of 2010 compared with the same month of 2009 - driven by markets in Germany, the United States and China. The company expects to sell more than 1.4 million cars worldwide by year's end.
"Right now we are running at full capacity," said Jochen Mueller, a spokesman at the factory in Leipzig, which turns out 750 cars a day, including BMW's popular X1 urban sport utility vehicle.
"Above all, the X1 is in very high demand and we decided to keep the factory open between Christmas and New Year's," Mueller said.
Leipzig assembly worker Marcus Henze said this would be the first of eight years at BMW where he is returning to work between the official Christmas and New Year's government holidays.
"Of course we would rather be home with families, but most people are OK with it," Henze said. "Motivation is very high."
The move appears to be unique in Europe. While British luxury automaker Jaguar-Land Rover say demand is up, they have been able to meet it through increased overtime, as has Sweden's Volvo. In France, neither Renault nor PSA Peugeot Citroen were changing their holiday schedules, while Italy's Fiat still hasn't returned to full production since the recession.
In Germany, Daimler, maker of Mercedes-Benz cars, said most of its 16 factories are reducing their year-end closure times to between Dec. 23 and Jan. 3.
"On average, the closures are about one week shorter this year in all of our factories than they were in the past two years of the crisis," said Dominique Albrecht, a Daimler spokeswoman, noting that decisions on closure times are up to each individual plant.
One factory in the northern port of Hamburg, where axles and other components for Mercedes Benz sedans are produced, will stay open between the official Christmas and New Year's.
Volkswagen AG said that "given the current high demand" its European factories will stay open through Dec. 23 - last year most closed for the year on Dec. 19.
Those where the Tiguan compact SUV and Passat sedan are assembled will reopen on the first Monday of the New Year, while other VW plants resume work on Jan. 10, VW spokesman Christoph Adomat said.
"In the past two years, the trend has been more in the other direction," said Adomat.
Volkswagen, Europe's largest automaker, is predicting a full-year delivery record of more than 7 million vehicles.
BMW Leipzig employee Mike Flieher doesn't mind the year-end hours.
"Basically, we view this as a positive," Flieher said. "We are happy to be busy."
Greg Keller in Paris, Jane Wardell in London, Colleen Barry in Milan, Sharon Silke Carty in Detroit, Cassandra Vinograd in London and Louise Nordstrom in Stockholm contributed to this report. Stocks Local stocks · Quickrank · A-Z List · · Index Performance · Market Movers

Identifying the wrong man as a Nazi. Implying that Haitians drink goat?s blood. The ABC News fake Toyota test drive. � Those are a few of the dozens of stories that made it onto this year?s edition of ?,? the annual catalogue of the best of the worst in journalism mistakes.

description.hltext_display: Fejvesztve menekült a pomponos lány az amerikafocista elől - videó
description.content: A cheerleaderek szép látványt nyújtanak az amerikaifoci-mérkőzéseken, ám a gyönyörű lányok élete meglehetősen veszélyes is tud lenni játék közben a pálya szélén. Előfordul ugyanis, hogy a hatalmas termetű játékosok egyes szituációkban a nagy lendület miatt elhagyják a pályát, ilyenkor nem könnyű megállítani őket, főleg nem, ha egy ötven kilós csinos kislány állja az útjukat. Ezért is ijedt meg annyira az egyik pomponos lány, amikor felé tartott egy focista, nem is próbálta meg megállítani, inkább fejvesztve menekült előle. Mindenesetre nem rajta múlt, hogy elmaradt a nagy tarolás, hiszen az ijedtségtől inkább helyben futott a kishölgy.

description.hltext_display: 网民意志不可违 清华教授蔡继明因何告百度
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)因提出了拆散五一黄金周的建议，清华大学教授蔡继明随即遭到网民在百度贴吧的恶语谩骂。深感受到伤害的蔡教授遂将北京百度网讯科技有限公司诉至法院,要求删除贴吧中侮辱的言论，并赔偿精神损失费等共210余万元。日前，海淀法院驳回了蔡教授的索赔诉求。这本是意料之中的事，但蔡继明的代理人表示将上诉。
近年来，发生的网络官司不少，可是像蔡继明这样因网友过错,直接追究网站责任的不多。
蔡教授状告百度败诉，可能内心感到很委屈，很不服气。因为他遭受了众多网友的唾骂，而百度贴吧为这些辱骂者提供了平台。当然，如果从蔡教授的个人心理是可以理解的，但蔡教授忽略了一点，作为一个可能对社会起决定性的公众人物，只凭自己的感觉胡言乱语，自然会引起民众的反感。以往，民众反感，可能也就私底下发几句牢骚，而现今有了互联网，民众可以通过互联网来表达自己心中不满的情绪，可能有些网友在表达的时候，有些偏激，但有一点说明，蔡教授的假日改革拆散方案很令民众反感。
公众人物，已经不是普通个体，要承担更多来自社会的压力。所以，公众人物也必然需要有更强的社会耐压性。在网络普及的今天，必然会受到来自网络的种种压力，其中包括因网络弊端存在的不良行为。除非不再担任公众人物，否则来自网络的侮辱、攻击就难以绝迹。
而公众人物所谈论的公众话题，必然触及许许多多人的利益，会引起更多人关心，赞成和反对者都有。因有这些想法的人身份、素养各异，其表达意见的方式也不同，没有必要太过计较。既然谈论公众话题,就要有遭到各种反对的心理准备。
此外，还有一个因素不可忽视。这就是网民有自由表达自己意见的权利，网络的这种推动社会发展的功能已经受到各方面的肯定。
在此案中，法院肯定了网络平台在参与社会生活、推动社会发展等方面的重要作用。此案主审法官接受采访时表示，贴吧只是公众舆论对公众人物和公众事件发表言论的渠道，从保护社会利益的角度出发，不应对网络言论采取过于严格的措施。
在这一点上，我们完全可以说，网民意志不可违。对蔡教授来说，在自己的假日改革不被网友认可的同时，应该知道自己的假日改革不得人心。如果心胸广阔一点，不必理会网友的侮辱和漫骂，因为是你的错误改革方案，不负责任的行为引发了网友们愤怒的情绪!在适当的时候，应该反思一下，自己为何会让网友侮辱和漫骂!
如果说，百度依照蔡教授的说法，删除贴吧，这等于剥夺了民众的自由言论权，这是逆时代而行，是要遭到遗弃的。
作为百度来说，对于像这种民众自主在网上建吧来表达自己心里想法，为他们提供一个平台，是时代所趋!而蔡教授状告百度，其实也是在堵塞民意，违背了时代，岂有不败之理!（来源：天极网）

description.hltext_display: Majors Daily Forecast 22 December 2010
Churches meet needs as county shelters fill up
description.content:
St. Paul, Minn. — Homelessness has shot up during the recession and its aftermath.
The federal government estimates that the number of homeless families has increased by a 30 percent over the past three years.
The estimate in Minnesota is a 25 percent increase. The result is emergency shelters operated by counties are almost always full to overflowing.
Every night in Ramsey County, homeless families who can't find room at the county shelter in Maplewood are bused to a participating Project Home church.
Central Presbyterian in downtown St. Paul is one of them.
Project Home Director Sara Liegl says during the year 34 churches and synagogues each donate space seven nights a week for a month.
"For most churches, you've got choir practice on Wednesday night and then the lights go out," she said. "We've got great resources in the faith community with these buildings and you know people who are hurting that have no place to lay their heads that night."
Twenty people, parents and children, spend the night here in the church dining room sleeping on beds and mattresses in areas sectioned off by cardboard partitions.
The accommodations are a bit on the spare side, not much privacy, but the families are warm and safe.
There are snacks, games, movies and conversation along with volunteers who supervise the arrangements.
At Gloria Dei Lutheran Church in St. Paul's Highland Park, another Project Home participant, families gather in a big room with a piano and a big screen TV.
Two teachers are on hand to help the school age kids with homework.
The Project Home staff don't want names of the people they help made public.
A mother with a child says if it weren't for the church's emergency family shelter she'd be living in her car.
"I thank the churches for letting us stay because they don't have to open up their house of god to us, it's like taking a risk," she said.
Claire Hoyum, Gloria Dei congregation president and former volunteer coordinator says, her understanding of what causes homelessness has changed.
"One event that may be completely outside their control can so affect their ability to provide stability for their families. . . And it's at times like these when I think if I were in that situation I'd want to know that the community is there to support me and as a member of the community I want to do that," Hoyum said.
Stays at Project Home churches average a few days to a couple weeks.
Director Sara Liegl says most of the overflow emergency shelter beds are full most of the time.
She says many of the families are first time homeless even though a number of the adults have jobs.
"These are all families who five years ago they were making it, they were doing just fine, probably missed a bill here or there but next month they'd get a couple extra hours on their paycheck and they'd make it up. The families we see now really struggle month to month just to barely make it," Liegl says.
Ramsey county will spend about $8 million this year helping people who are homeless.
Part of the money helps families find a place to live.
Depending on circumstances the county pays the deposit and even the first month's rent.
State budget cuts for homeless and other social services are likely as legislators deal with the state budget deficit.
One lawmaker suggests churches and other charities will be expected to do more to pick up the slack.
Gloria Dei shelter volunteer Dan Erlandson said he wonders if a volunteer effort can match the need.
"How do you do that in any kind of organized fashion that addresses a lot of need?" he said. "To me it's a larger issue than just a few congregations can address."
A survey last year by the St. Paul-based Wilder Center estimates more than 13,000 Minnesota residents are homeless each night. Just over a third are families.
Religious groups in several other Minnesota cities including Grand Rapids, Rochester and Anoka operate emergency family shelters as do churches in hundreds of other cities around the country.
An economic recovery will likely help more families get back on their feet and slow the rate of growth in demand for help.
However it's not clear that's begun happening, at least as measured by demand for Project Home emergency family shelter beds.

description.hltext_display: Inde: les compétitions internationales de la lecture du Saint Coran commencent mercredi
description.content:
New Delhi(IQNA)- La 7e édition des compétitions internationales de la lecture du Saint Coran de l’Inde commence mercredi 22 décembre à Bhopal avec la participation des représentants de la République Islamique d'Iran.
Selon l'Agence Internationale de Presse Coranique(IQNA), citant le site UMMID, des récitants de toute l’Inde et d’autres pays du monde, y compris de la République Islamique d'Iran, du Pakistan, de la Grande-Bretagne et du Panama participeront à ces compétitions.
Ces compétitions de deux jours sont organisées par l’Association Internationale Zinat-ul-Quran de l’Inde et les participants se concurrent selon les différentes méthodes de la récitation du Saint Coran en respectants les principes du tajwid.
A l’issue de ces compétitions, des prix seront décernés aux quatre premiers lauréats et tous les participants se verront attribués une mention spéciale. 715813

description.hltext_display: KBR übernimmt Roberts and Schaefer Co.
description.content:
Houston (aktiencheck.de AG) - Der Ingenieur- und Baukonzern KBR Inc. (ISIN US48242W1062/ WKN A0LEFS) meldete am Dienstag, dass er die Roberts & Schaefer Co., eine Tochter Elgin National Industries, für 280 Mio. Dollar übernehmen wird. Roberts & Schaefer mit Sitz in Chicago ist ein Anbieter von EPC (Engineering, Procurement und Construction)-Services für Massengutumschlags- und -verarbeitungssysteme und verfügt über Aktivitäten in Salt Lake City (Utah), Brisbane (Australien), Gleiwitz (Polen), Jakarta (Indonesien) und Ahmedabad (Indien).
Die Aktie von KBR schloss gestern an der NYSE bei 29,59 Dollar. (22.12.2010/ac/n/a)

description.hltext_display: 谷歌宣布将Gmail免费电话服务延期一年
description.content:
http://b2b.toocle.com 2010年12月22日09:26 中国电子商务研究中心 发表评论 联系我们
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，谷歌本周一在博客中说，在美国的Gmail电子邮件服务用户在新的一年里将能够继续免费拨打在北美和加拿大的电话。
当谷歌在今年8月宣布能够从Gmail服务中免费打电话的功能时，谷歌的计划是在今年年底之前向美国的Gmail用户提供免费拨打美国和加拿大电话的功能。但是，谷歌现在说，这些用户在整个2011年都可以免费拨打美国和加拿大的电话。谷歌说，给其它国家打电话将继续收费。
据市场研究公司IDC的高级分析师罗莎琳德・克雷文(Rosalind Craven)说，谷歌延期这项免费服务最可能的原因是谷歌没有吸引到它在8月份希望的那样多的用户。
克雷文说，谷歌有财力提供免费拨打固定和移动电话的服务以便吸引更多的用户，因为谷歌像Skype那样并不依赖于电话赚钱。如果谷歌有一天决定开始收费，这个服务的使用不可避免地会下降。这项服务的持续流行是由服务质量、使用的方便性以及如何很好地集成这项服务等因素决定的。
CCS Insight研究经理本・伍德(Ben Wood)说，Gmail等大型网站服务提供的这种打电话的能力正在蚕食运营商的收入。他还说，有证据表明，企业用户在国外旅行时正在利用自己的智能手机使用Skype服务打电话，这将威胁到运营商利润仍然很丰厚的漫游业务。
谷歌发言人说，从Gmail打电话的功能仅向在美国的用户提供。谷歌没有说世界其它地区的用户什么时候能够使用这项服务。（来源：赛迪网）

description.hltext_display: 2011 Infiniti M56
description.content:
When I got hold of the new Infiniti M56S the one thing that came to mind was “What the heck does the M stand for anyway?”
After driving around in the sporty luxury machine several ‘M’ words started coming to mind
Magnificent. Marvelous. Magical. All of which represent really just the tip of this special car.
The M56 has an athletic stance, sitting low to the ground on 20-inch alloy wheels, but it still maintains a sexiness about it with all its beautiful curves.
Climb inside the M and you’ll find a gorgeous interior complete with wood trim integrated around the curvy dash.
The seats are super comfy with power heated/cooled seats up front that hug your body to keep you in place.
The centre stack has plenty of buttons for you or your front passenger to play with. Just make sure you are aware of how to get back to where you need to be. Steering-wheel controls will be a benefit for the driver in this case.
Some cool technology features include a lane departure system that beeps when you start drifting from your lane and you don’t have your turn signal on.
Another is a blind spot indicator that ... well ... warns you when someone is in your blind spot.
Add in the distance control assist that senses the car ahead of you and will keep a determined amount of room between you and it.
If you aren’t driving like an inconsiderate maniac you may never even notice these features. And good for you.
I truly enjoyed the 14 channel Bose 5.1 surround sound system complete with 16 speakers. Having the good old iPod hooked up directly to the audio system was a bonus and my tunes never sounded so good.
Trunk space is really good, with only one minor problem — the rear seats don’t fold down. Sure there’s a middle pass through, but if you have to pick up anything like a new flat screen you’re out of luck. Is this a suggestion that M56 drivers just get there large techie items delivered?
The beauty also comes with plenty of brawn in the form of a 5.6-litre V8.
Press the start button on the dash and the big power plant comes to life. Matched to a seven-speed automatic, the M56 has 420 horsepower and 417 lb.-ft. of torque at its disposal. Pushing your right foot down on the gas you get an exciting jump off the line and passing power is never missing.
The seven-speed transmission shifts through the gears quickly and doesn’t need any coaxing to get moving. Control freaks will appreciate the manual mode, complete with steering wheel paddles.
The ride is a bit on the stiff side and definitely feels more like a performance sedan than a weekend cruiser. Taking corners and quick turns is exhilarating and even though the M56 is a rear-wheel drive it doesn’t feel like it wants to let go of the road.
The M56 is a beautifully sporty model that will only make you want a better life for yourself. And then you too will wonder what the M stands for.
One thing it doesn’t stand for is Mine ... and that’s a disappointment for the entire family.

description.hltext_display: AN aprueba Ley de Defensa de la Soberanía Política y Autodeterminación Nacional
description.content:
Parlamento suspenderá legisladores desleales con su organización política (Noticias Nacionales)
Diputados deben apegarse a programa de gestión y compromiso con elector (Noticias Nacionales)
AN aprobó reforma parcial de Ley de Contraloría General de la República (Noticias Nacionales)
Reforma a Ley de Universidades fortalece democracia participativa (Noticias Nacionales)
El instrumento legal, que contiene 10 artículos, tiene por objeto proteger el ejercicio de la soberanía política y la autodeterminación nacional de la injerencia extranjera / La bancada parlamentaria opositora -Podemos y Frente Humanista- votó en contra por considerar que "es un acto más de persecución a la disidencia"
La plenaria de la Asamblea Nacional sancionó con mayoría calificada la Ley de Defensa de la Soberanía Política y Autodeterminación Nacional, luego de darle visto bueno en segunda discusión durante en la noche de este martes.
El instrumento legal, que contiene 10 artículos, tiene por objeto proteger el ejercicio de la soberanía política y la autodeterminación nacional de la injerencia extranjera, "que mediante ayudas económicas o aportes financieros destinadas a organizaciones con fines políticos, dedicadas a la defensa de los derechos políticos o personas naturales que realicen actividades políticas, puedan atentar contra la estabilidad y funcionamiento de las instituciones de la República", reza el artículo 1.
El diputado Rafic Souki, del Partido Socialista Unido de Venezuela (PSUV), manifestó que con esta ley se evitará que partidos políticos y organizaciones no gubernamentales sean financiadas por factores externos a los objetos de perpetrar acciones desestabilizadoras en el país.
Por su lado, el Partido Comunista de Venezuela, en voz del diputado Edgar Lucena, mostró su acuerdo con la ley porque condena "cualquier forma e intervención imperialista, a través de su financiamiento y todo tipo de recurso proveniente del narcotráfico", agregó.
Sin embargo, el diputado Lucena dijo la bancada comunista salvaba su voto por considerar que no garantizaba, a su juicio, la consolidación del internacionalismo proletario.
"Nosotros consideramos que tal como está planteada la ley afecta el principio del internacionalismo proletario que se expresa en la cooperación internacional de los trabajadores, de los pueblos y de los movimientos revolucionarios del mundo", explicó Lucena.
La bancada parlamentaria opositora -Podemos y Frente Humanista- votó en contra por considerar que "es un acto más de persecución a la disidencia".
(VTV/AVN)

Promedio (2 votes)

description.hltext_display: Les visiteurs ont été très intéressés par les technique de calligraphie
description.content:
Téhéran(IQNA)- Les services d'information de l'université "Imam Khomeiny" ont annoncé qu'Ahmad Pilechi Ghazvini, calligraphe de Ghazvin, avait participé à l'exposition de Shanghai en 2010, où il effectuait des calligraphies des noms divins et des noms des Ahl-ul-bayt (AS).
" . J'ai été très étonné de voir que les chinois connaissaient les noms du Prophète et de l'Imam Ali (AS).
Le stand iranien qui faisait 2000 m2 a reçu plusieurs artistes iraniens pendant une semaine. Cette exposition dure six mois et accueille chaque jour, plusieurs millions de visiteurs qui font la queue pour acheter le billet d'entrée.
Il y a à Shanghai un centre d'enseignement des langues orientales où de nombreux étudiants apprennent le persan. Les services consulaires ont décidé d'organiser des cours de calligraphie dans ce centre.
Il y a aussi de nombreux étudiants de l'université internationale de Ghazvin, du Japon, de la chine, du Liban, d'Indonésie, de Turquie et des pays arabes et africains qui ont suivi des cours de calligraphie. Ghazvin est la capitale de la calligraphie et nous espérons pouvoir développer nos activités dans l'avenir", a-t-il dit. 715991

description.hltext_display: Ordnungsangelegenheiten und Ausländerstelle der Region Hannover
description.content:
- Die Donnerstags-Sprechzeiten in den Teams Allgemeine Ordnungsangelegenheiten, Ausländer- und Asylrecht sowie Einbürgerungen der Region Hannover ändern sich zum Jahreswechsel. Darauf weist die Region Hannover hin. Künftig sind die Ansprechpartnerinnen und Ansprechpartner in der Maschstraße 17, 30169 Hannover, donnerstags von 8 bis 12 Uhr sowie von 13 bis 17.30 Uhr erreichbar.
Alle Sprechzeiten im Überblick:
Montag 8 bis 12 Uhr

description.hltext_display: Citing Declining Membership, Women?s Clubs Around The Country Close
description.content:
In the 1950s, more than two million women across the country were in women?s clubs, performing charitable works like crocheting blankets for war veterans or raising money for local scholarships.
Today only 100,000 women belong to these groups. We speak with 84-year-old Margaret Atkins, who is the longest-serving member of the Cabot Club in Middleborough, Massachusetts, which recently announced it is closing.

description.hltext_display: 人民搜索20日宣布推出新闻搜索1.0
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)人民日报社旗下 。履新后首次正式亮相的人民搜索总经理邓亚萍坦言，人民搜索面临着前所未有的挑战。
邓亚萍说：“2010年是人民搜索的搜索之年。新闻搜索1.0版，是人民搜索对新闻搜索的全面尝试，我们新闻搜索1.0整合新闻、评论、图片、视频等内容让网友感受新闻的八面玲珑。人民搜索挑战前所未有，我们会勇于担当，锐意进取。”
中国的搜索引擎市场一直呈现高潮态势。最新调查数据显示，2010年第三季度，中国搜索引擎市场规模达31.5亿元人民币，同比增长57%，预计全年将突破100亿元大关。
在这样的市场诱惑下，众多互联网巨头摩拳擦掌，除了传统的搜索巨头百度、谷歌和必应，老牌门户网站也纷纷推出的独立品牌，诸如腾讯搜搜、搜狐的搜狗、网易的有道等，而人民搜索和新华搜索这样的新军也开始发力。
据悉，人民搜索是人民网推出的以新闻为主的搜索引擎，由人民日报社和人民网合资组建的人民搜索网络股份公司负责运营。人民搜索于2010年6月20日正式上线测试。2010年9月25日，邓亚萍正式担任人民搜索网络股份公司总经理。
同日人民搜索与中国科学院建立联合搜索引擎实验室。分析人士认为，人民搜索拥有传统搜索企业不可比拟的优势，很可能会打破目前百度一家独大的局面。
会后举行了“中国搜索引擎发展战略研讨会”。（来源：中国新闻网

description.hltext_display: Accueil chaleureux au convoi humanitaire asiatique en Syrie
description.content:
Syrie(IQNA)- Ce convoi appelé "Liberté pour Gaza 1" est arrivé à Damas le 20 décembre 2010, et a été chaleureusement reçu par les habitants de Damas et les responsables syriens.
Le siège de l'Agence Internationale de Presse Coranique(IQNA) en Syrie, citant le site d'information champress, a annoncé que 150 représentants de 20 pays asiatiques dont la République islamique d'Iran, envisageaient de se rendre à Gaza par le port égyptien d'Al Arish.
Ce convoi appelé "Liberté pour Gaza 1" est arrivé à Damas le 20 décembre 2010, et a été chaleureusement reçu par les habitants de Damas et les responsables syriens.
Yussof Abbas, représentant des convois syriens, a déclaré que l'envoi continu d'aides humanitaires vers la Bande de Gaza montrait que la question de la Palestine n'avait pas été oubliée et que les peuples libres résistaient à la politique d'oppression du régime sioniste.
Faisant allusion aux nouveaux membres de ce convoi, il a déclaré que le convoi syrien comprenait mille personnes et des aides alimentaires et médicales, pour les habitants de Gaza. 715998

description.hltext_display: "LEGO Universe" auch für 2011 mit neuem Inhalt!
description.content:
Bereits in der ersten Woche nach dem Start von "LEGO Universe" stürmten die Spieler voller kreativem Tatendrang über 12.000 persönliche Grundstücke, um ihre eigenen originellen LEGO-Modelle zu entwerfen. Auch zwei Monate später herrscht im LEGO Universe noch immer Pioniergeist. Allein im letzten Monat haben sich die Moderatoren mehr als 86.000 Spieler-Grundstücke angesehen. Die Spieler bauen und programmieren alles, was sie sich schon immer erträumt haben Festungen, Burgen, Baseball-Spielfelder, Raumstationen und vieles mehr.
Seit der Veröffentlichung des Spiels arbeitet das Entwicklerteam an Erweiterungen für LEGO Universe. Jeden Monat wurden neue Inhalte hinzugefügt, Community-Events ins Leben gerufen und dergleichen mehr. Unter anderem wurde das Spiel auch um das "Froststadt"-Update bereichert: Die limitierte, im Dezember veröffentlichte Zone beschert den Spielern rechtzeitig zu den Feiertagen eine weihnachtlich angehauchte Welt mit winterlichen Missionen, Charakteren und Erfolgen.
"LEGO Universe ist ein MMOG. Im Vordergrund steht daher das gemeinsame Bauen, Kämpfen und Erforschen mit Freunden und der ganzen Familie", so Mark William Hansen, LEGO Universe-Senior Director bei The LEGO Group. "Schon wenige Wochen nach dem Start erfreut sich LEGO Universe über einen sagenhaften NPS-Wert. Der NPS-Index gibt an, mit welcher Wahrscheinlichkeit Nutzer ein Spiel weiterempfehlen und beträgt im Falle von LEGO Universe bei der Zielgruppe der 8- bis 12-jährigen sagenhafte 70%!"
Im Jahr 2011 wird es neue Interaktionsmöglichkeiten für den Mehrspielermodus geben, und die Spieler werden in community-basierten Missionen gemeinsam mit ihren Freunden spielen oder gegen sie antreten können. Außerdem bieten sich LEGO-Fans durch neue Haustier-Features, Fraktions-Bausätze, neue Fähigkeiten, Waffen, Erfolge und andere Erweiterungen noch mehr Möglichkeiten, ihrer Persönlichkeit und Kreativität Ausdruck zu verleihen. Und auch die "LEGO Universe" Geschichte soll weiter vorangetrieben werden. Es wird neue Welten freizuschalten und neue Handlungsstränge zu entdecken geben.
Jetzt gibt es noch einen Trailer zu dem "Froststadt" -Update für "LEGO Universe"!

description.hltext_display: Google移动搜索量三季度同比增长130%
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)北京时间12月14日消息，据国外媒体报道，Google当地时间周一表示，第三季度该公司移动搜索量同比增长130%。
Google今天为其移动平台增添了商家评级广告格式，使搜索用户可以在搜索广告中查看商家的评级。商家评级的数据将来自商家评级网站。Google称，只有商家的评级在四星及四星以上，以及评论超过30条时，才会显示商家的评级。商家评级广告显示评级，并包含一个指向对商家评论的链接。
Google表示，商家评级广告只出现在Google.com、Google.co.uk和Google.de网站上。Google警告称，这类广告只适用于向用户提供付费产品或服务的商家，以及能使用户通过市场购买、销售产品或服务的商家。 Google继续强化其移动搜索服务并不让人感到吃惊。Google移动搜索业务营收增长相当强劲，Google在最近的财报分析师电话会议上称，2010年移动搜索业务营收将达到10亿美元。Google产品管理高级副总裁乔纳森仿奚???Jonathan Rosenberg)当时称，移动搜索量比过去2年增长了5倍。（来源：中关村在线）

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.
The spokesman said: "On arrival, firefighters were bringing the two patients out of the smoke-filled house.
"As further crews were only seconds away, the first (crew to arrive) decided to leave the scene immediately with the child to take him to University Hospital in Coventry.
"While the crew worked on the child, a firefighter drove the ambulance."
The ambulance service spokesman said the second crew to arrive immediately took over efforts to revive the man before taking him to the same hospital.
"Sadly, despite the best efforts of fire, ambulance and hospital staff, it was not possible to save either the man or the boy and they were both confirmed dead shortly after arrival at hospital," the spokesman said.
Group Commander Mick Birch, of West Midlands Fire Service, said: "The incident involved an unattended chip pan left on a cooker in a rear kitchen, which sadly has resulted in an adult male and a male child dying from smoke inhalation. West Midlands Fire Service are keen to remind people that chip pans should never be left unattended.
"People never believe that a fire is going to happen to them until it does," Mr Birch said. "Sadly, a tragic accident occurred, which has meant that a man and a boy won't be seeing Christmas this year."

description.hltext_display: Father Creates ?Council Of Dads? To Take His Place
description.content: Two years ago this week, bestselling author Bruce Feiler underwent 15 hours of surgery to remove a malignant tumor from his leg. We� want to revisit a conversation we had with Bruce about the book he wrote about his experience with cancer. It?s called ?,? and it?s about the group of men Bruce identified to take his place for his young daughters if he died. � Today, we?re happy to report, Feiler is cancer-free.

description.hltext_display: Last-minute gifts for your car-lover
description.content: Driving gloves or shoes: You can buy these online, or make up a "I O U" personal gift certificate since, after all, you want your giftee to try these on (and it buys you some time). You can spend about as much as you want. Check out Bottega Veneta, Alfred Dunhill for gloves, as well as designers such as Gucci and Ferragamo. For shoes, try Puma, Piloti or Sparco for the enthusiast; Prada for the poseur. Tod's is a good choice for shoes and gloves.

description.hltext_display: AKTIE IM FOKUS: Morphosys an TecDax-Spitze – Weitere Meilensteinzahlung
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) – Eine weitere Meilensteinzahlung hat die Aktien des Biotechunternehmens Morphosys am Mittwoch an die TecDax-Spitze getrieben. Morphosys-Aktien stiegen bis 9.45 Uhr um 2,47 Prozent auf 18,68 Euro. Mit dem Tageshoch bei 18,95 Euro lagen sie nur knapp unter dem Hoch vom Oktober vergangenen Jahres. Der Auswahlindex für Technologiewerte büßte gleichzeitig 0,35 Prozent ein auf 840,45 Punkte.
Morphosys hatte mit einem Antikörper-Programm den siebten klinischen Meilenstein mit einem Partner erreicht. Die Zahlung kommt von Centocor Ortho Biotech, die erneut einen Antrag für eine klinische Studie gestellt haben. Morphosys hatte bisher für 2010 mit maximal sechs Partnerprogrammen gerechnet, die in die klinische Erprobung gelangen werden.
Equinet-Analyst Martin Possienke kommentierte entsprechend positiv: "Die Geschäftsentwicklung im Bereich Partnered Discovery verläuft weiter sehr zufriedenstellend.” Das übertroffene Ziel von sechs Meilensteinzahlungen stütze seine Erwartung, dass die Ergebnisse für das Gesamtjahr am oberen Ende des erst am 10. Dezember aktualisierten Ausblicks liegen dürften. Der Experte beließ seine Einstufung für die Aktien auf "Buy” mit einem Kursziel von 34 Euro.
Morphosys hatte die Umsatzprognose auf 91 bis 94 Millionen Euro (Vorjahr: 81) angehoben. Beim operativen Gewinn werden 13 bis 16 Millionen Euro nach bis dahin 7 bis 9 Millionen Euro erwartet./ag/la

description.hltext_display: Das Jahr der Freiheit
description.content:
Von Linda Präauer am 22. Dez 2010 um 08:32 | Kommentare (0) | Teilen
Zahlreiche Herausforderungen und Aufgaben machten das nun endende Jahr zu einem lebhaften Abenteuer.
Besonders öffnete der Schulabschluss mit Matura im Juni die Tür zum kreativen Arbeiten als freischaffende Designerin, welches mir nun eigenständiges Denken und uneingeschränktes Handeln ermöglicht.
Die freie Entfaltung der Persönlichkeit, die keiner Überwachung übergestellter Autoritätspersonen unterliegt, beschert mir eine innere Zufriedenheit, welche ich nicht missen möchte.
Mein Leben widme ich der Zukunft und der Kunst.
Denn die Kunst ist die Tochter der Freiheit.
Linda Präauer, 20 Jahre, Oberalm
(Frohe Weihnachten an das gesamte MeinJung-Team!
Bitte im Falle einer Veröffentlichung das neue Foto verwenden. Danke für alles!)

description.hltext_display: Apple TV 販売台数、100 万台に達する見込み
description.author: nifty
description.content:
Apple TV
Apple は、2010年12月22日、Apple TV の販売台数が、今週末 100 万台に達する見込みだと発表した。
Apple TV は、HD 映画や TV 番組に加え、YouTube、Flickr、MobileMe からストリーミングされるコンテンツをハイビジョンテレビで観られるようにするもので、Apple Store および Apple Online Store などで 8,800 円で販売されている。

description.hltext_display: 3カ国語対応の軽量スマートフォン「Libero 003Z」、12月24日発売
description.author: nifty
description.content:
ニュース検索
モバイル 2010年12月22日(水)15時54分配信 ＋D Mobile
ZTE製の「Libero 003Z」（写真：ITmedia）
ソフトバンクモバイルは12月22日、ZTE製のAndroidスマートフォン「Libero 003Z」を12月24日に発売することを発表した。なお、12月24日に発売されるのはチタンブラックのみで、ホワイトは2011年2月中旬以降に発売予定。
003Zは、ソフトバンクのAndroid端末では最軽量となる115グラムを実現した軽量のスマートフォン。OSはAndroid 2.2をサポートしている。ディスプレイはワイドVGA表示対応の約3.5インチTFT液晶、カメラは500万画素CMOSを搭載。日本語、英語、中国語の3カ国語に対応しており、メニュー、ブラウザ、文字入力を変更できる。
また、ソフトバンクモバイルが12月24日から提供する、ホーム画面に仕事向けのアプリやウィジェットを表示できる「ビジネスホームスクリーン」と、仕事に役立つアプリやニュースを紹介する「仕事アプリナビ」も利用できる。【田中聡，ITmedia】
【関連記事】
・写真で解説する「Libero 003Z」
・Android 2.2スマートフォンは6機種――ソフトバンク、2010年冬・2011年春モデル24機種を発表

description.hltext_display: 教材やプロジェクターをスマートに収納 「IT教卓」、ライオン事務機から
description.author: nifty
description.content:
2010年12月22日(水)15時48分配信 誠 Biz.ID
出典：ライオン事務器（写真：ITmedia）
ライオン事務器は、学校や図書館向けの教卓「IT教卓」を2011年1月5日に発売する。価格は8万3790円。【藤村能光，Business Media 誠】
ノートPCやプロジェクター、副教材を載せるテーブルとして利用できる教卓。スライドテーブルの上には2口コンセントを設けている。
機器のケーブルを接続したまま教卓内に収納でき、使用時のケーブル接続作業は不要。スライド天板の引き出し幅が500ミリで、天板と収納部との幅差は前後とも55ミリ。「教師が軽く膝を曲げた状態でも、膝が当たらないように配慮している」（ライオン事務機）という。
本体上下にRGBケーブルを通せるスリットを設け、ケーブルをまとめて収容しやすくした。収納部扉上部のスリットからケーブルを通せるため、扉を閉じた状態で使用できる。
大きさは800×600×900ミリ（幅×奥行き×高さ）。
【関連記事】

description.hltext_display: eBay.com rettet verzweifelte Last-Minute-Shopper
description.content:
eBay.com hat am einen neuen Weg für Last-Minute-Shopper gefunden, die noch pünktlich an ihre Weihnachtsgeschenke kommen wollen: GiftsNearby - Geschenke in und aus der nächsten Umgebung.
Es ist die erste Integration der lokalen Warenbestands-Verfügbarkeit von Milo auf eBay. GiftsNearby ist ein neuer Weg für Last-Minute-Einkäufer, um ihre "finalen Einkaufsorgien" zu vereinfachen, denn die Wunschobjekte sind ganz in ihrer Nähe verfügbar und abholbereit. Zusätzlich können Käufer, die ihre Waren in einem BestBuy-Store einkaufen eBay Bucks verdienen.
GiftsNearby listet auch nur die Händler auf, deren Lagerbestand des Wunschartikels noch bei etwa 25 Stück liegt, sodass man den Artikel, wenn man schnell genug ist sicher noch erhält.

description.hltext_display: Projet de compétitions internationales coraniques pour les enseignants des universités du monde de l'islam
description.content:
Téhéran(IQNA)- Le centre a remis ce projet au Président de la République qui l'a accepté et qui a demandé au ministère de la culture et de l'orientation islamique, et à l'Association des dons et des affaires caritatives, de prendre en charge l'élaboration et l'application de ce projet.
Ali Asghar Sha'a'i, responsable de la commission "Coran et Etrat" de l'université des sciences coraniques, a déclaré le 20 décembre 2010, qu'un projet était à l'étude pour des compétitions internationales coraniques réservées aux enseignants des universités du monde de l'islam.
"Le centre a remis ce projet au Président de la République qui l'a accepté et qui a demandé au ministère de la culture et de l'orientation islamique, et à l'Association des dons et des affaires caritatives, de prendre en charge l'élaboration et l'application de ce projet.
Après les compétitions internationales universitaires réservées aux étudiants, ce programme contribuera au rapprochement et à l'union des milieux universitaires et à la présentation des potentialités pédagogiques du monde chiite. L'université des sciences coraniques accueillera avec plaisir les propositions des professeurs d'universités et des centres coraniques", a-t-il déclaré. 715485

description.hltext_display: 谷歌对微软IE9最新测试结果提出质疑
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)据国外媒体报道，针对独立测试公司NSS Labs最新公布的浏览器安全性测试结果，Google官方表示无法完全接受该报告结论。NSS Labs最新公布的结果显示，在拦截社交工程恶意软件方面，微软IE9测试版拦截率高达99%，而Google Chrome浏览器仅为3%。社交工程恶意软件骗取用户对某网站的信任，却在网站中夹藏恶意软件，并直接下载到受害者的电脑上并执行。
Google认为，NSS Labs使用微软最新版浏览器IE9与Google旧版浏览器Chrome 6进行对比是不科学的。目前，Chrome 8已经发布稳定版，NSS Labs应当使用Google最新版浏览器。事实上，NSS Labs早已在9月份测试过Chrome 6，但微软和NSS Labs一直到12月份才公布结果。 Google公司发言人表示：正如我曾经所说，这项测试仅限于社交工程恶意软件，但排除了插件漏洞和浏览器自身的漏洞。Google Chrome可以有效地防止用户下载恶意软件和插件漏洞攻击。最近，我们还在浏览器中添加了Flash播放器沙盒技术。显然，这项测试有很大的局限性。该报告并没有评估插件漏洞和浏览器漏洞的影响。 Google发言人还对NSS Labs测试方法表示了怀疑。Google表示：测试方法并不能称得上独立。尽管NSS Labs公布了测试环境和网络设置，但NSS Labs并没有公布测试所用的URL链接，因此我们就无法验证测试结果的独立性。（来源：教育信息化）

description.hltext_display: Federal Government Approves New Rules On Internet Access
description.content:
The Federal Communications Commission approved a controversial set of rules today for Internet traffic. Under the new regulations,� companies that provide Internet access via fixed lines, like cable, will face more restrictions than companies that provide wireless Internet access.
FCC Chair Julius Genachoswki says the new rules ensure equal access for consumers today and help foster future innovation. Proponents of so-called ?net neutrality? say the rules fall short, while some Republicans argue that the rules place a burden on companies, and may be beyond the authority of the FCC. We have details and analysis from Brendan Greeley, technology and policy reporter for The Economist magazine.

event_or_fact.property: the new rules ensure equal access for consumers today and help foster future innovation

entity.property: Internet Access The Federal Communications Commission

description.hltext_display: Culinary students explore health care jobs at hospital
description.content:
/p> Type Size A A A
For more than 60 years, students at the Culinary Institute of America have learned the ins and outs of the restaurant business.
A new class offered this semester takes a look at food preparation in a different industry — health care.
Three seniors in the pilot Foodservice Management in Health Care class toured Vassar Brothers Medical Center on Monday to see how food is prepared for patients.
As food service workers scooped green beans and macaroni and cheese onto lunch plates, the three students quizzed CIA alumnus and Vassar Brothers Executive Chef Anthony Fischetti on the many aspects of his job.
CIA instructor Lynne Eddy, who developed the course, said the goal is to educate students on a "different type of meal service and career opportunities."
In the health-care industry, food managers must know exactly how much sodium is in the food, the calorie count and nutritional content. Special attention must be paid to the types of fats and oils used, she said.
Eddy said the school is partnering with several local health-care facilities, including Kingston Hospital, Northern Dutchess Hospital in Rhinebeck and Saint Francis Hospital in the Town of Poughkeepsie.
Sang Hyun Park, 30, of South Korea said that the health-care industry is an attractive option because a larger company may be more likely to sponsor an international student's work visa than a smaller restaurant.
He and classmates Megan Eckhardt, 23, of Wisconsin and Jason Hopkins, 35, of Virgina said they had never seen some of the equipment, such as a machine that reheats one side of a food tray while keeping the other half cold.
Eddy said the class would be offered again in April.
Reach Emily Stewart at estewart@poughkeepsiejournal.com or 845-437-4882.

description.hltext_display: Les compétitions coraniques et la présentation des problèmes du monde de l'islam
description.content:
Téhéran(IQNA)- Les compétitions coraniques universitaires sont les activités culturelles les plus importantes du Djihad universitaire. Elles ont des dimensions nationales et internationales, et permettent de connaitre les jeunes qui exercent des activités coraniques dans les pays islamiques ou non islamiques.
Ali Montazeri, membre du corps enseignant de l'université, responsable du Djihad universitaire et organisateur des compétitions internationales universitaires, a accordé un entretien à l'Agence iranienne de presse coranique dont nous vous présentons le contenu :
Monsieur Montazeri, quel est à votre avis le rôle des compétitions organisées en Iran dans la présentation exacte du régime islamique et la dénonciation des mensonges de la propagande internationale ?
- Les compétitions coraniques universitaires sont les activités culturelles les plus importantes du Djihad universitaire. Elles ont des dimensions nationales et internationales, et permettent de connaitre les jeunes qui exercent des activités coraniques dans les pays islamiques ou non islamiques. Ces jeunes ont l'occasion de parler des problèmes du monde de l'islam, d'échanger leurs expériences et leurs informations. Elles peuvent aussi être l'occasion de programmer des activités et des réseaux de relations sociales entre les spécialistes de différentes branches scientifiques. Un autre objectif est de faire connaitre le régime islamique et ses acquis aux jeunes, de montrer les différentes dimensions de la culture chiite et de déjouer les complots ourdis par les ennemis pour créer des dissensions.
Quelle est l'influence de ces compétitions sur la vision que se font les concurrents de la République islamique d'Iran ?
-Lors de leur retour, ces étudiants peuvent être les ambassadeurs de la République islamique et présenter les vérités du régime chiite. Il faut que les organisateurs aient à l'esprit que nous ne sommes pas à la recherche de réunions protocolaires mais que nous avons un objectif stratégique auquel il faut prêter attention et qui accroit la sensibilité de ces compétitions.
Quels programmes avez-vous prévus en marge des compétitions pour atteindre ces objectifs ?
- Il faut organiser des réunions sur la Palestine, Gaza, la guerre psychologique et cybernétique, l'Irak, l'Afghanistan, la résistance au Liban et la situation des minorités musulmanes. Il est possible d'atteindre une unité de point de vue dans les milieux universitaires sur ces questions, sans entrer vraiment dans des domaines politiques.
Est-ce que des compétitions de ce genre sont organisées dans les autres pays ?
- Je n'ai pas d'information sur ce sujet mais je pense que ces compétitions sont uniques en leur genre. Il existe néanmoins des réunions et des compétitions sur des sujets culturels et artistiques pour les étudiants. A mon avis ces compétitions doivent être inscrites au nom de la République islamique d'Iran et du Djihad universitaire, et enregistrées au programme de l'OCI ou de l'Unesco. C'est aux responsables qu'il revient de faire avancer cette question pour le développement de la propagande coranique et de la propagande islamique révolutionnaire.
Quel est le rôle de ces compétitions dans l'instauration de l'union islamique ?
- Ces compétitions appartiennent à tous les étudiants musulmans et avancent dans le cadre des principes culturels islamiques. Les chiites doivent aussi respecter les nécessités de l'union, notre but est l'union et non l'exposition des divergences. L'union du monde islamique est un des principaux soucis du Guide suprême, l'Ayatollah Khamenei. Vous avez entendu les échos de ses récentes décisions dans le monde de l'islam. L'attention ne doit pas se porter sur les divergences mais sur les points communs, dans le cas contraire cela pourrait avoir des conséquences négatives dans les domaines sociaux, culturels et politiques. Le Guide suprême de la Révolution a insisté sur le fait que les ennemis de l'islam, dans leur rejet de la religion, étaient unis et que c'était une grande erreur de recourir à une propagande qui exclut au lieu d'unir. Il n'y a pas de vérités supérieures au Coran, le monde de l'islam a besoin d'une unité à l'ombre de ses enseignements. 715266

description.hltext_display: E&Y accused of Lehman whitewash: Report
description.content: The New York's attorney general is accusing accounting giant Ernst & Young of helping Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc disguise its financial condition for more than seven years, while collecting more than USD 150 million in fees from the firm, according to a media report. "New York's attorney general Andrew Cuomo is accusing E&Y of helping Lehman Brothers disguise its financial condition for more than seven years, while collecting more than USD 150 million in fees from the firm," The Wall Street Journal reported.The lawsuit filed by Cumo alleges that firms engaged in practices to temporarily erase as much as USD 50 billion in Lehman assets. This often occurred near the end of a quarter, allegedly making the company look much healthier than it was, the report noted.The two companies worked together from 2001 until Lehman's 2008 collapse.The accounting maneuver, called Repo 105, was used to shift the assets off Lehman's books in return for a promise to buy back the securities at a premium days later. Cash received by Lehman immediately was used to pay down other debts."Ernst directly facilitated an accounting sleight of hand that burnished the securities firm's balance sheet," the report said quoting the lawsuit.While citing E&Y's statement, the report said that there was "no factual or legal basis" to bring a claim against the firm, and that it would vigorously defend against the claims in Cuomo's lawsuit."Lehman's accounting was in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and Lehman's bankruptcy was not caused by any accounting issues," it added.The 32-page civil-fraud lawsuit depicts a cozy relationship between the big accounting firm and its client. Two of Lehman's chief financial officers -- Christopher O'Meara and David Goldfarb were former E&Y employees during much of the seven-year period when the transactions in question occurred"New York's attorney general Andrew Cuomo is accusing E&Y of helping Lehman Brothers disguise its financial condition for more than seven years, while collecting more than USD 150 million in fees from the firm," The Wall Street Journal reported.The lawsuit filed by Cumo alleges that firms engaged in practices to temporarily erase as much as USD 50 billion in Lehman assets. This often occurred near the end of a quarter, allegedly making the company look much healthier than it was, the report noted.The two companies worked together from 2001 until Lehman's 2008 collapse.The accounting maneuver, called Repo 105, was used to shift the assets off Lehman's books in return for a promise to buy back the securities at a premium days later. Cash received by Lehman immediately was used to pay down other debts."Ernst directly facilitated an accounting sleight of hand that burnished the securities firm's balance sheet," the report said quoting the lawsuit.While citing E&Y's statement, the report said that there was "no factual or legal basis" to bring a claim against the firm, and that it would vigorously defend against the claims in Cuomo's lawsuit."Lehman's accounting was in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and Lehman's bankruptcy was not caused by any accounting issues," it added.The 32-page civil-fraud lawsuit depicts a cozy relationship between the big accounting firm and its client. Two of Lehman's chief financial officers -- Christopher O'Meara and David Goldfarb were former E&Y employees during much of the seven-year period when the transactions in question occurred

description.hltext_display: Costos de producción de Alven y Sanitarios de Maracay serán transformados con participación obrera
description.content:
Expropiadas Aluminios de Venezuela y Sanitarios Maracay por violación de leyes laborales (Noticias Económicas)
Gobierno ejecutó ocupación forzosa de Sanitarios Maracay y Aluminios de Venezuela (Noticias Nacionales)
Trabajadores de Sanitarios Maracay solicitan expropiación de la empresa (Noticias Nacionales)
Los trabajadores de la planta tienen sus derechos garantizados y reivindicados / Se reactivará la capacidad de producción de las piezas sanitarias
Los costos de producción de Aluminios de Venezuela (Alven) y Sanitarios Maracay, ambas situadas en Aragua, serán transformados con la participación directa del pueblo obrero.
Así lo informó, mediante una nota de prensa, el Ministro del Poder Popular para la Ciencia, Tecnología e Industrias Intermedias, Ricardo Menéndez, quien inspeccionó las instalaciones de Sanitarios Maracay, empresa que disponía del 44% de su aparato productivo a la producción de piezas
sanitarias.
"Tanto Alven como Sanitarios Maracay transformarán los costos de producción, esto con la participación directa del pueblo obrero. Con la materia prima que está en nuestros suelos vamos a generar los insumos de construcción, al costo necesario para satisfacer la demanda acumulada de vivienda que se ha venido generando, producto y resultado del capitalismo", subrayó Menéndez.
Garantizó a los trabajadores de la planta que sus derechos serán reivindicados.
"Sólo en el Socialismo los costos de producción son distintos, donde la clase trabajadora se debe para satisfacer las necesidades del pueblo y no para enriquecerse. La clase obrera tiene que ser vista como un valor fundamental del pueblo y razón de ser de la Revolución Bolivariana", indicó.
Comentó que pronto se reactivará la capacidad de producción de las piezas sanitarias.
"Esto sólo se logrará y se hará con los trabajadores y a las reivindicaciones profundas del derecho que ellos tienen. Con la reivindicación profunda de que en el socialismo no existe la explotación del hombre por el hombre y de que en el socialismo se construye con una sonrisa clara y profunda lo que es el futuro de todos los venezolanos", dijo.
Informó que se instalarán un conjunto de comisiones para revisar los almacenes y sus inventarios, además se revisará la parte mecánica y de mantenimiento.
Adicionalmente, se evaluará los atropellos que padecieron los trabajadores de Sanitarios Maracay.
"Dejaron durante cuatro años la materia prima acumularse en las tuberías, así como el área de los hornos donde picaron los cables de electricidad para paralizar la empresa. Aquí están los trabajadores y el Gobierno Nacional y la responsabilidad del gobierno regional para asumir de manera integral el proceso de recuperación de está empresa", resaltó.
Se estima realizar un cronograma de trabajo, donde el Gobierno Nacional de la mano de los trabajadores, revisará cada uno de los casos, tanto laboral como de operatividad de la empresa a fin de reactivar la factoría.
"Va a ser un trabajo continúo y duro, para incorporar en el menor tiempo posible algunas piezas sanitarias a las viviendas del pueblo de Venezuela. La irresponsabilidad del capitalismo desafía de mucha creatividad, mucho valor, compromiso de la clase trabajadora y conciencia para enfrentar al capitalismo", puntualizó.
Al referirse al caso de Alven, el ministro Menéndez mencionó se centrará en la construcción de los marcos para las ventanas y puertas de las casas de muchos hogares venezolanos.
"Con Alven se quiere restablecer un equilibrio dentro de la visión de los insumos y mercancía para el área de la construcción y transformar la adquisición de aluminio para los hogares", expresó.
El presidente de la República Bolivariana de Venezuela, Hugo Chávez Frías, firmó durante la transmisión del programa Aló, Presidente Nº 368, realizado este domingo en el Complejo Habitacional El Morro, parroquia Petare, municipio Sucre, del estado Miranda, el decreto de adquisición forzosa de los bienes muebles, inmuebles y bienhechurías de las empresas Sanitarios Maracay y Alven.
"Son dos empresas que nos van a permitir fortalecer la capacidad de insumos destinados para la producción", aseveró.

description.hltext_display: DGAP-News: Curcas Oil N.V.: Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. startet Zwischenfruchtanbau von Jatropha mit Erdnüssen
description.author: feed_dgap_corporate
description.content:
DGAP-News: Curcas Oil N.V. / Schlagwort(e): Sonstiges Curcas Oil N.V.: Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. startet Zwischenfruchtanbau von Jatropha mit Erdnüssen
22.12.2010 / 09:57
——————————————————————— Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. startet Zwischenfruchtanbau von Jatropha mit Erdnüssen
Amsterdam, Niederlande, 22. Dezember 2010
Curcas hat sich entschieden der Erkundung und, wo möglich, dem Zwischenfruchtanbau (’intercropping’) mit dem Ziel schnellere Erträge auf neuen Plantagen zu erzielen, nachzugehen. Da neue Jatrophabäume mit einem Abstand von 2,5m gepflanzt werden, hat die Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. damit angefangen Erdnüsse zwischen den Jatrophabäumen zu pflanzen, um die Nutzung des Landes zu maximieren.
Normalerweise dauert es 12 bis 15 Monate bevor die ersten Jatrophasamen von den neuen Bäumen geerntet werden können. Während dieser Zeit wird die Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. mit dem Anbau der Erdnuss als Zweitpflanze Erträge erzielen. Die Erdnüsse werden für einen Zeitraum von zwei Jahren angebaut und geerntet, so lange die Jatrophabäume noch jung sind und genügend Licht und Platz für das Wachstum zulassen. Während diesem Zeitraum können Erdnüsse alle vier Monate geerntet werden.
Da Curcas nur brachliegendes oder marginales Land für den Anbau von Jatropha verwendet, liefert eine Ernte ungefähr 1.000 Kilo an Erdnüssen pro Hektar oder 3.000 Kilo pro Hektar pro Jahr. Dies ist ein niedriger Ertrag als auf einem guten Boden. Der Zwischenfruchtanbau wird nichtsdestotrotz das kurzfristige ROI der neuen Plantagen verbessern und des Weiteren das Wachstum von Unkraut verhindern. Es existiert ein lokaler Markt für Erdnüsse und der Preis liegt bei ungefähr 50 PHP (0,86 EUR) pro Kilo, woraus sich ein Ertrag von ungefähr 150.000 PHP (2.586 EUR) pro Hektar pro Jahr ergibt.
Curcas hat die Absicht den Anbau von Erdnüssen auf einer Fläche von 300 Hektar während 2011 zu starten. Sofern dies möglich ist, wird Curcas Oil N.V. dieselben Zwischenfruchtanbaumaßnahmen bei Ihren Tochtergesellschaften in Thailand und Indonesien anwenden.
Die Erdnuss (Arachis hypogaea L.) oder Bodennuss ist eine beliebte Feldfrucht auf den Philippinen. Sie ist eine der Hauptfeldfrüchte, die durch Bauern angebaut wird, wobei die Produktion jedoch niedrig und unstet verläuft.
Über Curcas Oil N.V. Curcas Oil N.V. ist ein Produzent für Jatropha ‐ Rohöl. Über ihre Tochtergesellschaften AlternativeEnergy Manufacturing Ltd. (Thailand), Curcas Oil Philippines Inc. (Philippinen) und PT Pengembangan Jarak Indonesia (Indonesien) baut Curcas Oil N.V. Jatropha‐Pflanzen zur Gewinnung von Jatropha ‐ Rohöl in einer verantwortlichen und nachhaltigen Art und Weise an.
Curcas Oil N.V. Haaksbergweg 71 1101 BR Amsterdam The Netherlands Tel. +31 20 312 1212 info@curcas‐oil.com www.curcas‐oil.com
Ende der Corporate News
22.12.2010 Veröffentlichung einer Corporate News/Finanznachricht, übermittelt durch die DGAP – ein Unternehmen der EquityStory AG. Für den Inhalt der Mitteilung ist der Emittent / Herausgeber verantwortlich.
Die DGAP Distributionsservices umfassen gesetzliche Meldepflichten, Corporate News/Finanznachrichten und Pressemitteilungen. Medienarchiv unter http://www.dgap-medientreff.de und http://www.dgap.de

description.hltext_display: Las ventas del sorteo se mantienen en los mismos niveles que el año anterior, cerca de 2. ...
description.content:
Las ventas del sorteo de Navidad se han mantenido relativamente estables respecto al año pasado, con una caída del 0,2 por ciento hasta cerca de los 2.700 millones de euros, según ha adelantado el director general de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), Gonzalo Fernández.
Fernández ha subrayado en una entrevista a TVE recogida por Europa Press que, teniendo en cuenta que el año pasado las ventas cayeron un 3 por ciento en relación con 2008 y la actual "situación económica" de España, la caída del 0,2 por ciento de 2010 puede ser entendida como "una remontada, un inicio de cambio de ciclo".
Por otro lado, sobre la entrada de capital privado en LAE, anunciada por el Gobierno, Fernández ha comparado la situación de LAE con la de otras empresas españolas hace años y ha afirmado que tiene "la visión" de que, en un plazo de cinco a diez años, Loterías y Apuestas del Estado se convertirá en "una gran empresa en el mundo internacional en el juego".
El máximo responsable de LAE ha agradecido a la red de ventas el trabajo que han realizado en este Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad, que este año ha tenido "un alto nivel de exigencia" debido a los cambios introducidos "que complican un poco más el quehacer", como la nueva sede o el hecho de que los premios mayores se puedan recoger al día siguiente en lugar de a los nueve días, como era tradicional.
Fernández ha deseado a todos los que participan "que sean afortunados en el reparto de premios y especialmente en el gordo". Sobre el propio sorteo, ha indicado que se trata de "un rito más que si no se produce no tienes la Navidad completa" como ocurre con la compra de los turrones o el cava.
Mientras, el director de comercial de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado, Juan Antonio Gallardo López, también ha agradecido la labor de la red de ventas y de las más de cien personas que participan en la jornada del miércoles en el sorteo.

description.hltext_display: Indian entrepreneurs' stress levels up, less than global peers
description.content: Stress levels of Indian entrepreneurs have risen markedly in the last two years, but are still less than their global peers, a recent survey has revealed. While 40 per cent of entrepreneurs in India have said their stress levels have risen in the last two years, the figure stands at 46 per cent globally, according to a survey by Regus.The rise in stress levels clearly indicate the difficult economic environment of the past two-years which have left a mark not only on business attitudes but also on the entrepreneurs' personal lives, the survey said.The survey conducted by Regus, a global workplace solutions provider, canvassed the opinions of over 5,000 entrepreneurs in 78 countries asking them about their recent revenue and profit trends, along with their main concerns and causes of stress in the past years.On the major preoccupation behind that stress, the survey found that in India, in particular, late payments were the main concern of entrepreneurs followed by lack of cash or working capital to invest and cost of fixed overheads.Globally, entrepreneurs related that they are most concerned with falling profits and revenues."The second key concern, however, was a lack of cash or working capital to invest in the economic upturn, followed closely by worries over late payment," the survey said.This high level of stress among entrepreneurs should ring warning bells among policy-makers as SMEs play a vital role in fuelling the growth of the Indian economy by contributing 45 per cent of industrial output, 40 per cent of exports employing 60 million people, create 1.3 million jobs every year and produce more than 8,000 quality products for the Indian and international markets, it said.Regus (India) Country Head Madhusudan Thakur said, "Small businesses provide an important barometer of growth and innovation in any country. Entrepreneurial success is an indicator for innovation and future wealth generation.Given its importance, the concerns and obstacles faced by this segment are likely to have significant repercussions on the economy as a whole. In India, in particular, small businesses remain very concerned about key issues such as late payments."Thakur further said that as SMEs exit a period of economic difficulty and prepare to invest in the upturn, their concerns reveal that pressures around securing capital to invest are great."In addition to this, SMEs, particularly in India, continue to send out signals to the Government for additional assistance," he saidWhile 40 per cent of entrepreneurs in India have said their stress levels have risen in the last two years, the figure stands at 46 per cent globally, according to a survey by Regus.The rise in stress levels clearly indicate the difficult economic environment of the past two-years which have left a mark not only on business attitudes but also on the entrepreneurs' personal lives, the survey said.The survey conducted by Regus, a global workplace solutions provider, canvassed the opinions of over 5,000 entrepreneurs in 78 countries asking them about their recent revenue and profit trends, along with their main concerns and causes of stress in the past years.On the major preoccupation behind that stress, the survey found that in India, in particular, late payments were the main concern of entrepreneurs followed by lack of cash or working capital to invest and cost of fixed overheads.Globally, entrepreneurs related that they are most concerned with falling profits and revenues."The second key concern, however, was a lack of cash or working capital to invest in the economic upturn, followed closely by worries over late payment," the survey said.This high level of stress among entrepreneurs should ring warning bells among policy-makers as SMEs play a vital role in fuelling the growth of the Indian economy by contributing 45 per cent of industrial output, 40 per cent of exports employing 60 million people, create 1.3 million jobs every year and produce more than 8,000 quality products for the Indian and international markets, it said.Regus (India) Country Head Madhusudan Thakur said, "Small businesses provide an important barometer of growth and innovation in any country. Entrepreneurial success is an indicator for innovation and future wealth generation.Given its importance, the concerns and obstacles faced by this segment are likely to have significant repercussions on the economy as a whole. In India, in particular, small businesses remain very concerned about key issues such as late payments."Thakur further said that as SMEs exit a period of economic difficulty and prepare to invest in the upturn, their concerns reveal that pressures around securing capital to invest are great."In addition to this, SMEs, particularly in India, continue to send out signals to the Government for additional assistance," he said

description.hltext_display: Pawlenty held line on taxes, wrestled with deficits
description.content:
St. Paul, Minn. — Earlier this month, Gov. Tim Pawlenty strolled to the podium in the ornate reception room outside his office at the Capitol and boldly stated that the state's budget is balanced.
"The good news that we're here to share with you, of course, is we're going to end my time as governor in the budget cycle that we're in with a surplus and money in the bank."
Pawlenty was technically correct, since state finance officials say Minnesota has a $399 million surplus in the current two year budget. But what Pawlenty failed to highlight is that he's leaving Democratic Gov.-elect Mark Dayton and the Republicans ready to take control of the Legislature with a $6.2 billion budget deficit in the coming biennium.
Pawlenty called the massive budget hole a work of "fiction." That's a dramatic departure from 2003 -- when Pawlenty characterized the $4.5 billion budget deficit he was inheriting as "the Incredible Hulk of budget deficits."
Pawlenty has wrestled with budget problems since he first took office. It's partly due to a sputtering economy, but it's also due to the failure to enact permanent spending cuts or tax increases that would have balanced the budget over the long-term. That failure meant a budget roller coaster that went mostly downhill over the past eight years.
Pawlenty and the Legislature would see a surplus in 2006, when the governor said, "We've completed the biggest financial turnaround in Minnesota history."
But just two years later, the state faced a growing deficit.
Pawlenty's main governing principle was not to raise state taxes. With the exception of a fee on cigarettes of 75 cent per pack that he pushed in 2005, Pawlenty did not call for higher taxes during his eight years in office.
Pawlenty deflects blame for the state's ongoing fiscal problems. He argues that the DFL-controlled Legislature failed to adopt his proposed spending cuts over the past four years. He also said Minnesota is in the same position as every other state in the nation, and that he has successfully changed the course of Minnesota government. He calls himself the first true fiscally conservative governor in the modern history of Minnesota.
"This eight years and presumably the next four or eight with a Republican Legislature will be known as the time that Minnesota finally came to terms with its excesses and got itself on a more sustainable and responsible path," Pawlenty said.
For most of Pawlenty's two terms, Minnesota lagged the nation in creating jobs. A look at Minnesota's jobs record shows that the state has just 6,200 more workers now than it had in January of 2003. In January, 2009, the state's unemployment rate started performing better than the national average -- a point he repeatedly highlights during speeches.
A look at other numbers shows that Minnesota became less prosperous during Pawlenty's tenure, even when accounting for the national downturn. In 2002, Minnesota ranked eighth in the nation in per capita income. By 2009, the state had dropped to 14th in the nation.
Those state rankings concern Art Rolnick, a former director of research at the Federal Reserve Bank at Minneapolis.
"What's a little disturbing is the states that were higher than us back in 2000, they grew much faster," Rolnick said. "So it wasn't just simply a matter of the poor states catching up. We haven't stayed pace with some of the more successful states."
But Rolnick said Pawlenty shouldn't necessarily be blamed for the drop. He said government officials can do little to impact a state's business climate.
"Business cycles have this life of their own and it's very tough to manage at the national level, as we've seen, and that implies it's almost, if not impossible, to do that on the state and local level," Rolnick said.
Rolnick said his deepest concern with Pawlenty's tenure is the lack of focus on funding for education. A big proponent of early childhood education, Rolnick doesn't believe Pawlenty put enough attention or state funding into developing the state's future workforce. He points to the state's achievement gap between white and minority students as an example. During his 2003 State of the State address, Pawlenty said he would make tackling that disparity a top priority.
"I will not stand by and allow another generation of disadvantaged children to be cast aside," the governor said.
According to the Education Trust, a national organization that focuses on the education gap, Minnesota has not made any progress toward raising the test scores of minority and other disadvantaged students to those of white students. During an interview this week, Pawlenty blamed Democrats in the Legislature and the state's teachers' union for failing to adopt his education plans.
"Their rhetoric is they are for the poor and disadvantaged, but when it comes to giving poorer and disadvantaged children a chance to go to a private school or a school of their choice then they stand in the way of that," he said.
The state's high school graduation rate has improved since 2002. Minnesota also has the highest ACT scores in the nation.
A place where Minnesota has lost ground over the past eight years is the number of people who have health insurance. Minnesota still ranks in the top five in states with the highest percentage of insured people.
But the number of people without health insurance has increased. According to the Minnesota Department of Health 9.1 percent of state residents did not have health insurance in 2009, up from 6.1 percent in 2001.
One factor that led to higher numbers of uninsured people is Pawlenty's cuts to state subsidized health insurance. State Department of Human Services officials say there are more than 36,000 fewer people enrolled in MinnesotaCare in 2010 than there were in 2003. Pawlenty has repeatedly said that the cost of health care has to be reined in because it's growing at a faster rate than inflation.
But State Rep. Erin Murphy, DFL-St. Paul, said Pawlenty focused on the political instead of the practical. She said the governor did not want to address some of the biggest cost drivers in health care -- the elderly and the disabled - and instead focused on low income Minnesotans. She said he was also more concerned about how his political stances would be perceived on the national level.
"We haven't done our jobs in government if we want to rein in costs," Murphy said. "There is way more that could have been done in the past four years. Sometimes the governor was with us. Sometimes he was opposed to us. I think it often depended on the political calculation that he made and not necessarily the policy calculation that or the budgetary calculation that he made."
While Democrats argue that Pawlenty failed to invest in the state and failed to compromise with his political rivals, his supporters praise him for holding the line on taxes and spending.
David Olson, president of the Minnesota Chamber of Commerce, said Pawlenty worked to protect the taxpayer -- an often uncommon approach at the State Capitol.
"When people say, 'well, he just didn't raise taxes,' I think it's much broader than that," Olson said. "You have to look at the shape the state was in, the economy he had to endure. I think he did a really good job of keeping an eye on the taxpayer's wallet."
The key question is whether Pawlenty's track record will resonate nationwide. Pawlenty appears to be preparing to run for the White House. He said he hasn't decided yet whether he'll run or not but will decide by March.
